page.title: 14Employment.
page.content: In a predominantly country area such as ur block, the main source of employment is farming - mainly farm labourers who live in "tied" cottages provided by the farmer. The other source of employment is at the yacht marina, where boats of all kinds and sizes are maintained and repaired by skilled engineers and craftsmen. Boats come from all over the country for repair, and some of them are worth in excess of 100,000 pounds. They come for both mechanical and structural repair. Other employment is provided by the school (teachers,cook, caretaker etc.) and the two garages in the block (motor mechanics).
